statements: SELECT * FROM currencies
SELECT currency_name, currency_id FROM currencies
SELECT currency_id, currency_name FROM currencies
SELECT currency_name FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE currency_name = 'USD'
SELECT currency_id, currency_name FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT currency_name FROM currencies WHERE currency_name LIKE 'U%';
SELECT * FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_id ASC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT currency_id, currency_name FROM currencies WHERE currency_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001', '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002');
SELECT * FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_name FROM currencies WHERE currency_amount > 100;
SELECT currency_name, currency_amount FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE currency_name = 'USD';
SELECT currency_name, currency_amount FROM currencies WHERE currency_amount > 1000 ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT currency_id FROM currencies WHERE currency_amount < 500 AND currency_name LIKE 'Euro%';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_value > 100
SELECT item_name, item_value FROM items ORDER BY item_value DESC
SELECT item_name, item_value FROM items WHERE item_value BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currencies
SELECT * FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE item_value > 100 ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT currency_id, currency_name, currency_symbol FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_value FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE amount > 0 ORDER BY item_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM currencies WHERE currency_value > 100;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level >= 50 ORDER BY player_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE currency_id = 1;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM currencies WHERE currency_value > 100;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE LENGTH(item_description) > 50;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level >= 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY inventory_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Clothing';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_name, quantity FROM users JOIN user_inventory ON users.user_id = user_inventory.user_id JOIN inventory ON user_inventory.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%Doe%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT item_name, quantity, item_type FROM items JOIN inventory ON items.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, inventory_id FROM user_inventory WHERE user_id = 123 AND inventory_id IN (SELECT inventory_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5);
